body_html:
OK, it took two restarts and now I can't reproduce the bug... Not sure what happened. I should point out that I had attempted to upgrade to cuda 9 before this happened, discovered that it wasn't supported under Windows, downgraded to TF1.4, and after uninstalling cuda and reinstalling v8, this bug happened, and persisted after one restart, despite everything being in path. I also restarted PyCharm a bunch of times, so it seems that's not enough.

Now I rebooted again and everything is just working in PyCharm and CLI... Sorry for the confusion!

body:
OK, it took two restarts and now I can't reproduce the bug... Not sure what happened. I should point out that I had attempted to upgrade to cuda 9 before this happened, discovered that it wasn't supported under Windows, downgraded to TF1.4, and after uninstalling cuda and reinstalling v8, this bug happened, and persisted after one restart, despite everything being in path. I also restarted PyCharm a bunch of times, so it seems that's not enough.

Now I rebooted again and everything is just working in PyCharm and CLI... Sorry for the confusion!
